column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
from losing a lot of hair what can i do

It's important to determine the underlying cause before seeking treatment for hair loss. Common causes such as genetics, hormonal imbalances, vitamin/mineral deficiencies, certain medications, illnesses, and stress could be considered. You may want to schedule an appointment with your primary care physician to discuss possible treatments based on the underlying cause.
thank you i will i will definitely do that
You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
Great! If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to ask. Have a good day.
